s.text: The following tier of headlines, "Cultural Concierge/Land of the Pharoahs/Art in the age of the pyramids," communicates no sense of what this piece is actually about or why I need to read it now, as opposed to several thousand years ago.

The second issue of Talk magazine, Tina Brown and Harvey and Bob Weinstein and Cathleen Black's Wagnerian exercise in Gesamtkunst synergy, has been on newsstands for a week now.
